result.title: Oh, I Love Codeforces
result.content:
Codeforces is one of best website I have ever introducing to. I have started solving problem on the site, it's really excellent. And I have learn a lot from the website too. I hope I will become red one day like all the other coders who have come here for a long time.

And by the way, thanks for the many upcoming contests.

Thank you Mike Mirzayanov for hosting this wonderful site!

-Burstshot
